channel.title: Psp problems
channel.description: OK i left my psp at my neighbors house for a few days. I asked him for it back and he Lied and said he did'nt have it. So i search for a while. 3 months later im on a camp out with him and hes arguing with some idiot over who has the most syste and he blurts out "well i have 2 psps!" so i look at him and he says..i think ones yours. so i get it back and guess what? it wont DO anything. its as entertaining as a brik. no games work or movies or music. When i play a game on it it gives me a loading screen with the loading icon in the cornor but nothing happends. Any ideas on how to fix?

lmfao off at them the internet can do such cruel things to a humens mind=\

item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:15, topic:106955”]All this over a psp?
Simple go round to his house take his if he catchs you say ‘This is mine’ find a scratch and say i remember when i made this.[/quote] cant,he ripped the analog stick off mine. I think i know what is wrong though. The motor that moves the laser is dead and i need to replace it.
